mapper.select: /* findListPurchaseGroupCategoryItem */ SELECT ITEMCTGR.TEN_ID , ITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_CD , CASE WHEN ITEMCTGR.PAR_ITEMCAT_CD = '0' THEN 1 ELSE ITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_LVL END CATE_LVL , ITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_NM , ITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_NM_EN , ITEMCTGR.PAR_ITEMCAT_CD , PGITEMCTGR.PURC_GRP_CD , PGITEMCTGR.PURC_GRP_TYP_CCD , PGITEMCTGR.CO_CD , PG.PURC_GRP_NM , ITEMCTGR.SORT FROM ITEMCAT ITEMCTGR /* 품목분류관리 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN PURC_GRP_ITEMCAT PGITEMCTGR /* 품목분류_구매그룹_매핑 */ ON ( ITEMCTGR.TEN_ID = PGITEMCTGR.TEN_ID AND PGITEMCTGR.CO_CD = #{p.co_cd} AND PGITEMCTGR.PURC_GRP_TYP_CCD = #{p.purc_grp_typ_ccd} AND ITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_CD = PGITEMCTGR.ITEMCAT_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PURC_GRP PG /* 구매 그룹 */ ON ( PGITEMCTGR.TEN_ID = PG.TEN_ID AND PGITEMCTGR.PURC_GRP_CD = PG.PURC_GRP_CD AND PGITEMCTGR.PURC_GRP_TYP_CCD = PG.PURC_GRP_TYP_CCD AND PGITEMCTGR.CO_CD = PG.CO_CD ) WHERE ITEMCTGR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND ITEMCTGR.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ITEMCTGR.STS != 'D' ORDER BY ITEMCAT_CD, SORT
